Text.val: Looks into all open invoices for a specific debtor and lists all possible (existing) markcodes assigned to these invoices. The
output is used as filter dialog where the user can select markcodes
18.09.2012 AS SCR#17571 fixed hardcoded library name FLPROD in existing programs in direct SQL
continue with prog if access is not locked, otherwise print message and term
fill vector with the markcode selection specified in parameter ....

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_MARKCODESPEC,CODE_DESCRIPTION, COUNT(*) AS N from :3/invo a left outer join :3/code b ON b.code_numbern=a.invo_markcodespec and b.code_type=51 and b.CODE_LANGUAGE=':1' where a.invo_debc_no=:2 and a.invo_aactuali<>0 group by INVO_MARKCODESPEC,CODE_DESCRIPTION order by CODE_DESCRIPTION
